rows.label: tlk000007_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm looking to board a ship headed
for Superbia.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0002
rows.name: Have you got any space free?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0003
rows.name:
Not to worry, friend! Plenty space!
You traveling alone?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0004
rows.name: Um... Roughly six people, I'd say?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0005
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh?! That big group!

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0006
rows.name:
I offer special discount for group
travel. Let everyone board as much
as like for total of 4,000G.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm a salvager, by the way. I can travel
for free, can't I?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0008
rows.name:
Ah, Murmur not realize. In that case, I
make discount. That come to 3,000G.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0009
rows.name: Wait, so we can't go for free?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0010
rows.name:
Meh-meh? How many you say coming
on board?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0011
rows.name: Six...maybe more.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0012
rows.name: And how many of them salvagers?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0013
rows.name: Just...me.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0014
rows.name: Which mean how many non-salvagers?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0015
rows.name: Quite a lot.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0016
rows.name: Then should pay 3,000G.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0017
rows.name:
Murmur sorry. Me bighearted, but have
limits to kindness.

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0018
rows.name: Pay 3,000G?

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0023
rows.name: Pay

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0024
rows.name: Don't pay

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0019
rows.name: Thanks kindly!

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0020
rows.name:
Let Murmur know when friends ready
to board and we set off ship-shape!

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0021
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Avaritia Nopon drive a hard bargain.
It was much easier to get a discount in
Invidia...

rows.label: tlk000007_msg0022
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Ah well. I should head back to the inn
and meet up with the others.
